definition: gun/firearm/rifle/spear/thing with shape or function similar to a gun/CL:支[zhi1],把[ba3],桿|杆[gan3],條|条[tiao2],枝[zhi1]/to substitute for another person in a test/to knock/classifier for rifle shots

sentences.english: Gunshots were as common as wind gusts.
sentences.chinese: 在那里，枪战就像一阵风声那样常见。

sentences.english: After sundown, a fire broke out on its fourth floor.
sentences.chinese: 日落之后，四楼发生了枪战。

sentences.english: The announcement came a day after Sudanese troops killed six of the hostage-takers in a shootout.
sentences.chinese: 一天前，苏丹军队在枪战中打死了6名绑匪。

sentences.english: He was shot dead in a gunfight.
sentences.chinese: 他在一次枪战中中弹身亡。

sentences.english: Many parents blame that there is too much violence and gunplay in TV programs.
sentences.chinese: 许多家长批评电视节目太多凶杀和枪战。

sentences.english: The gunfighter knows a poor shot can get him killed.
sentences.chinese: 枪战能手懂得一次失败的射击会让他送命。

sentences.english: After a wild gunbattle, police broke into the room.
sentences.chinese: 经过一阵激烈的枪战，警察冲入楼内。

sentences.english: Spying and shoot-outs, treachery and torture, not to mention gruesome deaths.
sentences.chinese: 间谍，枪战，背叛，刑讯，任何一条都足以致人死地。

sentences.english: Still have senior fellow apprentice with what he encounters gunfight together constant a block of wood or stone.
sentences.chinese: 与他一同遭遇枪战的还有师兄常墩子。

sentences.english: The gunfighter draws from the hip, and aims calmly, under control.
sentences.chinese: 枪战能手稳定的射击，冷静的瞄准，懂得控制。

sentences.english: He said the gunfight in the area is sill on.
sentences.chinese: 他称该地区的枪战仍然在继续。

sentences.english: The little girl was cut down in a gun fight in downtown toronto.
sentences.chinese: 那个小女孩在多伦多闹区的枪战中失去生命。

sentences.english: An interesting shooting affray was on in the mountains of Kentucky.
sentences.chinese: 在肯塔基州山区发生了有趣的枪战。

sentences.english: Shootouts and grisly murders dominate media reports.
sentences.chinese: 枪战和恐怖的谋杀主导媒体的报道。

sentences.english: LeiYuan and director zhang JianBingHui for protection, and the occurrence of fierce gun battle.
sentences.chinese: 雷远和张局长为保护简炳辉，与之发生激烈枪战。

sentences.english: It has got too much violence and gunplay, which affects young people and even children.
sentences.chinese: 它有太多的暴力和枪战，影响青少年甚至儿童。

definition: to shoot with a gun/shooting incident
bunch of gangsters/criminal gang/organized crime syndicate
to open fire/to shoot a gun
acrobatic fighting in Chinese opera or dance
